title: Administration Plugin (Admin Menu)
description: AAA quality in game/code plugin Administration menu to manage users. Glord 3D is a digital media company that sells 3D models used in 3D graphics to a variety of industries, including computer games, architecture, and interactive projects.
longDescription:
Quick Product Brief

This C++ runtime plugin provides server admins of your game with an easy-to-use interface to control their online multiplayer game servers while they are connected to the game.

The controls range from, kicking and banning users and modifying the game users via a player list while the game is running. As well as a make admin/moderator mode to allow users to become an admin and have access to these permissions/functions.

It is the perfect tool for both everyday server administration as well as competitive match moderation or MMORPG administration menus, to prevent hacking and punish users who break the rules.

Purchase more Glord3D products here.

Features:

  • Advance player list/manager.
  • Kick and Ban players
  • Manage players from inside the admin menu
  • Grant players admin permissions.
  • Manage players via a player list by name or ID.
